Life in this district is peaceful and the population works in agriculture, trade, and raising animals. 

He works offering services as a day laborer and in fumigation in the various farms in his district and nearby zones, having his own tools such as a backpack sprayer. He also has a motorcycle which he uses to travel and also to do his work in the best way. He has more than 10 years of experience in the business and his clients offer very good personal and work references for him. The loan will be used to make repairs and maintain his tools and equipment that is in bad condition. This investment will serve him to have his equipment and tools in better condition which will have a great influence on his business. With this, Cesar hopes to improve the productivity of his services and in this way meet the various needs of his clients in the zone which will generate more income, allowing him to improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to make repairs and maintain his tools and equipment that is in bad condition.

loans.name: Gemma

texts.en:
Gemma is 47 years old, married, and has 13 children. With three children still in school, Gemma works very hard to provide for them.

Gemma runs a general store in the Philippines. She has been in this business for one year and sells a variety of items such as beer, rice, soft drinks.  

Gemma requested a PHP 8,000 loan through NWTF to buy item to sell like canned goods, cigarettes, and other groceries.

In the future, Gemma would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy item to sell like canned goods, cigarettes, and other groceries.

She is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy additional boxes of fish to make dried fish for her business.

Eleanor has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college in the future.

loans.use: to buy additional boxes of fish to make dried fish.

loans.name: Sonia Dolores

texts.es:
Sonia, es casada, su familia está integrada por su esposo y dos hijas de 12 y 22 años de edad, su hija mayor trabaja para ayudar con los gastos de su familia y la menor está estudiando, su actividad económica es la venta de pupusas, la desempeña hace más de 20 años y lo hace en un espacio de su vivienda.
Con el crédito que está solicitando comprara maíz, quesillo, aceite, chicharrón, tomates, repollo, etc., contara con la materia prima necesaria para elaborar la venta de pupusas, también podrá abastecer su negocio cada vez que sea necesario, espera que la afluencia de clientes aumente para tener mayores ventas.
Su sueño es mantenerse trabajando para que su hija menor culmine una carrera y tenga mejores oportunidades de desarrollo en la sociedad.
texts.en:
Sonia is married. Her family is made up of her husband and two daughters who are 12 and 22 years old. Her eldest daughter works to help with the family expenses and her youngest daughter is studying. Her economic activity is selling stuffed tortillas. She has been doing this for over 20 years and does it in a space in her home.
With the loan she is asking for she will buy corn, cream cheese, oil, crackling, tomatoes, cabbage, etc., and will have the necessary basic ingredients to sell stuffed tortillas. She will also be able to stock up her business whenever necessary. She hopes that her number of customers will increase in order to sell more. 
Her dream is to continue to work so that her youngest daughter can do a degree and have better development opportunities in society.

loans.use: to buy corn, cream cheese, oil, crackling, tomatoes, cabbage, etc., in order to have the ingredients to sell stuffed tortillas.

He is requesting a new loan in order to buy young grazing calves. This will allow him to continue generating income so that he can fulfill his commitments.

loans.name: Prospero

texts.es:
Prospero tiene 54 años de edad, vive en casa propia junto a su esposa en el distrito de Querocotillo que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Cutervo, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. Los pobladores de este distrito se dedican a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería principalmente.

El se dedica al cultivo de café variedad catimore, tiene 15 años de experiencia en esta actividad y cuenta con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales por parte de los pobladores de la zona. El préstamo lo utilizará para la compra de fertilizantes, abonos y deshierbos para su cultivo así como pago de jornales para la época de cosecha. Con esto Prospero espera ofrecer un café de mejor calidad a sus clientes lo que le va a permitir obtener mayores ingresos para mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Prospero, age 54, lives with his wife in his own house in Querocotillo.  It is in the Cutervo province in the Cajamarca region in the northern highlands of Peru.  The inhabitants of this district work primarily in agriculture, commerce, and with livestock.

He grows the Catimore variety of coffee.  He has 15 years of experience in this business activity, and he has very good personal and work references from the inhabitants of the area.

He will use the loan to buy fertilizers and compost and for weed control for his crops.  He will pay workers during the harvest time.  With this, Prospero hopes to offer his customers a better quality of coffee.  This will allow him to get greater earnings in order to improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and compost and for weed control for his crops and to pay workers during the harvest time.

loans.name: Yeredeme Group

texts.fr:
Kinemba est celle au milieu des 6 autres avec ses mains posées sur le sac de mil sur la photo.
Kinemba est une paysanne malienne âgée de 28 ans qui fait le stockage de mil depuis 3 ans. Mariée et mère de 8 enfants parmi eux 7 vont à l’école, son mari est paysan. Kinemba  n’a pas été à l’école, elle emprunte au RMCR pour  pouvoir acheter beaucoup de sacs mil à stocker. Elle s’approvisionne en céréales dans le marché du village et elle les vend en gros dans les marchés locaux de sa zone lors que les prix ont augmentés. Elle espère avoir un grand magasin de stockage de mil pour satisfaire sa clientèle. Le bénéfice qu’elle tire de son stockage lui permet de couvrir ses propres dépenses familiales : les frais scolaires, d’habillements de ses enfants.
texts.en: Kinemba is the woman who is in the middle of the other six women in the photo, with her hands on the sack of millet. She is a Malian peasant, who is 28 years old, and she has been stocking millet for the past three years. She is married and mother to eight children, seven of whom attend school. Her husband is a peasant too. Kinemba did not go to school and she is borrowing from RMCR so that she can buy a large quantity of sacks of millet to stock. She gets her supplies of cereals in the village market and she sells them wholesale in local markets in her area when the prices have gone up. She hopes to have a large warehouse to stock her millet, so she can satisfy customer demand. The profit she makes from her stocking activity allows her to cover her family expenses, school fees, and her children's clothes.

loans.use: to buy sacks of cereals to resell.

loans.name: Sabougnouma Group

texts.fr:
Wassa est la dame au milieu des autres dames et  tient le mouton en main sur la photo.
Mariée a un agriculteur, elle est malienne et n’a pas eu la chance d’aller  à l’école.  Wassa est âgée de 40 ans, mariée et mère de 3 enfants âgés de 18 à 11 ans. Ils ne sont pas scolarisés. Ayant comme activité l’agriculture pendant l’hivernage, Wassa fait l’embouche en saison sèche. Les animaux pour l’embouche sont achetés un peu partout aux alentours avec les peuls. Elle les nourrit biens, puis ils sont revendus sur le marché local. Elle exerce cette activité depuis plus de 8 ans. Avec le prêt RMCR, elle achète plus de moutons. Les récoltes n’étant pas suffisantes souvent, le profit de la vente des animaux lui permet de prendre en charge ses propres besoins et vraiment d’aider son mari dans la prise en charge des frais de condiments qui n’est pas facile, ainsi les récoltes pourront être épargné et serviront plus longtemps. Son rêve est de pouvoir, par cette activité acheter quelques moutons pour garder afin de devenir une grande éleveuse.
texts.en:
Wassa is the woman in the middle who is holding the sheep.  
She is a Malian, married to a farmer who never had the chance to go to school.  Wassa is 40 years old, married and the mother of three children ages 11 to 18.  They do not go to school.  She works in agriculture during the winter and works fattening animals during the dry season.  The animals are bought in different surrounding villages from the Peul people.  She feeds them well and then she resells them at the local market.  She has been involved in this activity for more than 8 years.  With the loan from RMCR, she will buy more sheep.  The harvests are often not enough and the profit from selling her animals allows her to take charge of her own needs.  The profits also allow her to really help her husband with the management of the costs of the food preservation, which are not easy, so that the harvests can be saved and can last much longer.  Her dream is to buy a few sheep to keep and become a sheep breeder.

loans.use: to buy animals and resell them after

loans.name: Andy Alexander

texts.es: ANDY ALEXANDER: Es un hombre luchador, originario de Puerto Cabezas, tiene 31 año de edad, padre soltero de 3 menores de edad: El mayor de 6 años estudia su segundo grado de primaria y dos pequeños de 4 y 2 años respectivamente. Trabaja como profesor de educación primaria, en una escuela de Bilwi. Con el fin de mejorar las condiciones de su hogar y tener una vivienda más digna y segura para su familia, solicita un préstamo para mejorar su vivienda que es de  madera y tambo. Con su préstamo quiere comprar materiales de construcción: madera, zinc, clavos y cubrir costos de mano de obra, ya que desde hace 20 años no cambia la madera. Su sueño es llegar a tener una vivienda de concreto (cemento) porque es de mayor durabilidad.
texts.en:
Andy Alexander is a determined man who is originally from Puerto Cabezas. He is 31 years old and a single father of three young children. His oldest child is six years old and in the second grade at a primary school. The two younger children are ages 4 and 2, respectively.

Andy works as a primary school teacher at a school in Bilwi. In order to improve his living conditions and provide a decent and safe home for his family, Andy is requesting a loan to improve his wooden stilt house. He wants to use the loan to buy construction materials such as wood, zinc, and nails, and to cover the cost of labor. The wood hasn’t been replaced in 20 years.

His dream is to have a concrete house because it is more durable.

loans.use: to buy construction materials and pay for labor in order to improve his wooden stilt house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy three strong heifers.

loans.name: Rysgul

texts.ru: Рысгул 31 год, замужем, есть 2 детей. У Рысгул среднее образование, она занимается разведением скота. У Рысгул в хозяйстве есть 3 коровы и 3 овцы. На 2, Га земли она выращивает люцерну для внутрихозяйственного потребления. Она известна, как спокойный, честный и надежный человек. На сегодняшний день ее деятельность приносит ежемесячную прибыль в сумме 5,000 сом (KGS). Для дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, она обратилась в Банк «Бай – Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку двух бычков. Доходы от кредита она планирует использовать для развития своего хозяйства.
texts.en: Rysgul is 31, married, and has two children. She has a secondary education and raises livestock. She has three cows and three sheep. She grows alfalfa on a two hectare plot of land for use on the farm. She is known as a calm, honest and reliable person. Her business currently earns 5,000 som (KGS) per month. In order to expand her business, she applied for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) with Bai-Tushum Bank to buy two young bulls. She plans to use her profits to develop her farm.

loans.use: to buy two young bulls to fatten and sell

loans.name: Maria Silveria

texts.es:
María tiene un negocio que consiste en la siembra de granos básicos como maíz y frijol, tiene 43 años de edad, es madre soltera de tres hijos, en edades de 20, 16 y 12 años de edad, todos son dependientes y están estudiando, por las mañanas asisten a la escuela y por las tardes le ayudan en las labores agrícolas, tiene más de 30 años de poseer su negocio, su área de siembra es de 2 manzanas de terreno, es un oficio que aprendió de sus padres, quienes todo su vida se han dedicado a dichas actividades.
Invertirá en insumos agrícolas y semilla mejorada de maíz y frijol, de esa manera aumentara la producción de granos básicos, para alimentar a su familia y vender una parte para generar ingresos con los que podrá cubrir otros compromisos. Los riesgos son un mal invierno que provoque la perdida de la cosecha.
Sus sueños son seguir luchando para tener recursos económicos con los que apoyará a sus hijos en sus estudios y que estos logren ser profesionales.
texts.en:
María has a business that consists of growing basic grains such as corn and beans. She is 43 years old and the single mother of three children, aged 20, 16 and 12. All of them are dependent and in school. They go to school in the morning and in the afternoon they help with the agricultural work. She has had her agricultural business for more than 30 years. Her crop area is 1.4 hectares of land. It is a trade that she learned from her parents, who worked at this type of activities for their whole lives.

She will invest in agricultural materials and in improved corn and bean seeds. This way, she will increase production in basic grains to feed her family and sell a portion to cover other commitments. The risks are a bad winter which might result in the loss of the harvest. 

Her dream is to keep fighting to have the financial resources to support her children in their education so that they can graduate from college.

loans.use: to invest in agricultural materials and improved corn and bean seeds This way, she can increase production of basic grains.

loans.name: Genelinda

texts.en:
Genelinda is 33 years old and married with three children who are in school. For the past 16 years, she has operated a fishing business in the Philippines. Genelinda is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Genelinda is requesting a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy additional materials such as fishing nets, gasoline, and other supplies for her fishing business. She would like to save enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fishing nets, gasoline, and other materials

loans.name: Honey Lou

texts.en:
Honey Lou works hard to support her family. For the past three years, she has operated a pig-fattening business in the Philippines.

Honey Lou is requesting a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase feed and vitamins for her pigs. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy animals to resell after

loans.name: Claudia Lorena

texts.es:
Claudia es una joven soltera de 26 años de edad, ella es madre de un pequeño de 6 años, desde su nacimiento se ha preocupado cuidarlo, educarlo, ella durante su embarazo y la etapa de crecimiento del niño fue muy apoyada por su familia con recursos, alimentos pero ahora que el niño tiene una edad donde sabe diferenciar cosas malas de buena, puede iniciar una actividad económica para ser ahora ella quien apoye a sus familiares y ganarse su propio sustento.

Con la ayuda de un préstamo quiere iniciar formalmente con una actividad como comerciante, con el monto solicitado, comprara la siguiente mercancía.
•	Ropa para hombre y mujer (blue jeans, camisas, camisetas, blusas)
•	Accesorios para dama
•	Lociones
•	Joyería en acero.
Este préstamo le permitirá generar su propios ingresos para el cuidado, educación y vivienda de ella y su hijo.
texts.en:
Claudia, age 26, is a single young woman.  She has a little six year old.  Since the birth of her child, she has been concerned with caring for him and raising him.  During her pregnancy and during the child’s growth, her family supported her a lot with resources and food.  However, now that her son is of an age where he knows right from wrong, she is able to begin a business activity.  She will do this so that she is the one who supports her family and earns her own sustenance.

With the help of a loan she wants to formally start with a business activity like being a merchant.  She will use the requested amount to buy the following merchandise:

• Men and Women’s clothes (blue jeans, shirts, t-shirts, and blouses)
• Women’s accessories
• Lotions
• Stainless steel jewelry

This loan will allow her to generate her own income for the care, education, and housing for her and her son.

loans.use: to buy men and women's clothes, women's accessories, lotions, and stainless steel jewelry.

loans.name: Jose Visitacion

texts.es:
Jose tiene 61 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive con su esposa en casa propia en una comunidad pequeña en la zona rural del distrito de Cayaltí que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. Los pobladores de esta zona se dedican principlamente a la agricultura y crianza de animales.

El se dedica a brindar servicio de transporte público en Cayaltí y distritos cercanos, realiza esta actividad desde hace más de 7 años, contando con experiencia en el negocio y con clientes fijos quienes brindan muy buenas referencias personales y laborales de el. Solicita préstamo para el mantenimiento de su mototaxi ya que actualmente se encuentra en mal estado, con esto Jose espera ofrecer un mejor servicio a sus pasajeros lo que tendrá un impacto positivo en su nivel de ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Jose is 61 years old. He is in a common law marriage. He lives with his wife in their own home in a small community in a rural area of the district of Cayaltí, located in the province of Chiclayo, Lambayeque region, on the northern coast of Peru. The residents of this area work mainly in agriculture and raising animals.  

He works offering public transportation service in Cayaltí and in nearby district. He has done this activity for more than 7 years. He has experience in the business and regular customers who offer very good personal and work references for him. He is asking for the loan to do maintenance on his motorcycle taxi because right now it is in poor condition. With this, Jose hopes to offer a better service to his passengers which will have a positive impact on his income level and therefore improve his and his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to do maintenance on his motorcycle taxi, because right now it is in poor condition.

loans.name: Pedro

texts.es:
Pedro, se dispone a sembrar maíz y solicita un nuevo financiamiento para comprar abono, semilla, herbicidas e insecticidas, le dará un mejor trato a la milpa para obtener una cosecha abundante.
El invertir el préstamo anterior en su negocio ha aumentado su ganado y la producción de granos básicos es mayor, la familia está en óptimas condiciones y sus deudas son menores.
texts.en: Pedro is getting ready to plant corn and is requesting a new loan to buy manure, seeds, herbicides and pesticides to treat his corn crops to get a good harvest. He invested the last loan in his business and increased his cattle and his basic grain production was higher. Hie family is in excellent condition and he has less debt.

loans.use: to buy manure, seeds, herbicides and pesticides to treat his corn to get a good harvest.

loans.name: Nicanora

texts.en:
Nicanora works hard to support her family. She is married and has a meat vending business in the Philippines.

Nicanora requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional meat to sell.

Nicanora has been in this business for three years now.

Nicanora would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional meat to sell.

loans.name: Prudencia

texts.en:
Prudencia is 57 years old and has nine children. She is married, and two of her children are still in school.

Prudencia is in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Prudencia has been in pig fattening for 25 years now, and has borrowed 15 times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Prudencia would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Remedios

texts.en:
Remedios is 50 years old and married with six children. With one child still in school, Remedios works very hard to provide for them.

Remedios runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional items to sell such as canned goods, noodles, sanitary pads, cooking oil, candies, etc.

Remedios has been in this business for four years and sells a variety of items such as canned goods, noodles, sanitary pads, cooking oil, candies, etc.

Remedios would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional items to sell such as canned goods, noodles, sanitary pads, cooking oil, candies, etc.

loans.name: Rosita

texts.en:
Rosita is 54 years old and has five children. She is married, and one of her children is still in school.

Rosita is in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Rosita has been in pig fattening for four years now, and has borrowed nine times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

Rosita would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Maria De La Paz

texts.es:
María, está solicitando un nuevo crédito para comprar leña al por mayor, para vender al menudeo y para poder elaborar la venta de tortillas, se mantendrá trabajando para continuar teniendo los ingresos necesarios para cubrir los gastos de su hogar.
Con la ayuda del crédito anterior ha mantenido su venta de tortillas, leña y crianza de pollos, en el mercado, las nuevas ganancias le han permitido mejorar su estilo de vida y hacer la apertura de una mini tienda de productos de primera necesidad.
texts.en: María is requesting a new loan to buy wood wholesale to re-sell it retail and to be able to make tortillas for sale. She continues to work in order to have the income necessary to cover the household costs. With the help of the last loan she kept up her tortilla, wood sales and raising chickens in the market. The new profits have allowed her to improve her standard of living and she has opened a mini-store with basic food items.

loans.use: to buy wood wholesale, to re-sell retail and to make tortillas to sell.

loans.name: Claudia

texts.es: CLAUDIA: Es una mujer luchadora, originaria de Puerto Cabezas, casada con 3 hijos: El mayor de 10 años de edad estudia su cuarto grado de primaria y dos menores de edad de 5 años y 4 meses respectivamente. Cuenta con una experiencia de 4 años de trabajar como secretaria, su esposo trabaja de manera informal, como albañil. Desde hace 5 años habita en una en una casa construida de madera y de tambo, que actualmente necesita reparación.  Es por eso que solicitan un préstamo para cambiar madera rústica, madera cepillada, postes de madera, clavos y cubrir costos de mano de obra. Ella y su marido sueñan con tener una casa de concreto que tenga mejores condiciones para sus hijos y sobre todo mayor seguridad, establecer un negocio para contar con otra fuente de ingresos y contribuir a mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en: CLAUDIA: She is a fighter from Puerto Cabezas. She is married and has 3 children. The oldest is 10 years old and he is in fourth grade of elementary school. The two youngest are 5 years old and 4 months old. She has 4 years' experience working as a secretary. Her husband works informally as a bricklayer. For 5 years, she has lived in a house made wood and on stilts. Right now, it needs repair. That is why they are asking for a loan to change the rustic wood, the planed wood, the wooden posts, the nails, and to cover the labor costs. She and her husband dream of having a home made of concrete with better conditions for their children and above all with more security, as well as starting a business to have another source of income and contribute to improving their family's quality of life.

loans.use: to repair her home which is on stilts and made of wood.

loans.name: Henry Juvencio

texts.es:
Henry, de 27 años de edad, estudió hasta cuarto grado, está acompañado y su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos, tiene dos hijos.

Henry, trabaja la agricultura desde que era pequeño. 

El préstamo lo utilizará para comprar abonos, venenos y arreglar las cercas en donde cultiva.

Henry, sueña con darle una buena educación a sus hijos y que sus cosechas sean buenas.
texts.en: Henry is 27 years old and studied up to Grade 4. His is in a relationship and his partner works doing domestic work. He has two children. Henry has worked in agriculture since he was little. He will use the loan to buy manure, poison and fix the fences where he has his crops. Henry dreams of providing his children with a good education and of having good harvests.

loans.use: to buy manure, poison, and repair the fences where he grows.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to start her first business, buy a selection of clothes, accessories, lotions and jewelry made of steel.

loans.name: Elda Nohemi

texts.es: Elda es una joven de 21 años de edad, quien es soltera y no tiene hijos dedicada al trabajo de campo como ser: la siembra de maíz, frijol, café y la cría de tilapias roja y negra. Ella tiene un grado educativo de primaria la cual termino satisfactoriamente gracias al apoyo de sus padres. Elda es una joven que desea salir adelante con su negocio como agricultora teniendo clientes seguros para su producto en los alrededores de la comunidad donde ella habita al momento de hacer el debido proceso para poder vender y salir adelante. Por lo que ella está solicitando crédito para la compra de fertilizantes, foliares, y demás insumos que son de mucha utilidad para poder asistir sus cultivos de café en esta nueva temporada y la planta está floreciendo estando en este momento vulnerable a plagas y demás enfermedades lo cual quiere y pretende evitar con este crédito. En sus metas y planes esta la construcción de una nueva pecera en la cual tiene pensado la crianza de más de 2000 tilapias productoras para que estas a su vez reproduzcan aún más y pueda venderlas para consumo en los hogares generando de esta manera más ingresos para su familia y su crecimiento como pequeña agricultora.
texts.en:
Elda is a 21 year old youth, who is single and has no children. She works in the country growing corn, beans and coffee and raising red and black tilapias. She completed one level of primary education thanks to the support of her parents.

Elda is a youth who wants to get ahead with her business as a farmer having loyal clients for her product in the area around her community when it is time to go through the process of selling and getting ahead. So she is requesting a loan to buy fertilizer, foliar spray, and other inputs that are of great value to be able to assist her coffee crops for this new season. The plants are flowering and this is the time when they are vulnerable to infestation and other sicknesses which she wants to avoid with this loan.

In the goals and plans is the construction of a new fish pond in which she wants to raise more than 2000 producing tilapias so that they reproduce and then be able to sell them for food to homes in this way generating more income for her family and growing as a small farmer.

loans.use: to buy foliar spray and fertilizers, amongst others to assist her coffee crops.

loans.name: Teresa

texts.en:
Teresa is 27 years old and a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Teresa has a pig fattening business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 18,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase feed and other supplies for her business.

Teresa has been in this business for three years. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase feed and other supplies for her business.

loans.name: Ameyo

texts.fr: Ameyo est une femme mariée âgée de 48 ans et vit à Klévé. Ameyo est une mère de deux enfants qui bénéficient d’une scolarité. Pour être toujours capable de répondre aux besoins quotidiens, Ameyo vend de la pate bandée avec de la viande pour satisfaire ses clients et gagner son profit. Ameyo s’approvisionne quatre fois par mois au  marché de lomé. Pour commander quelques sacs de maïs et des viandes afin de réaliser plus de revenus, Ameyo demande ce crédit pour financer son acha
texts.en:
Ameyo, age 48, is married with two children who go to school. She lives in Klévé. To ensure that the day-to-day needs of her household are met, Ameyo sells a dish of dough with meat, which pleases her customers and yields a profit. 

Ameyo buys her supplies four times per month at the market of Lomé. She is seeking this loan to finance a purchase of maize and meat. This will help to increase her profits.

loans.use: to buy one sack of maize and 2 cartons of meat.

loans.name: Warlita

texts.en:
Warlita is a married woman with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She is 40 years old, and two of her children are currently in school.

Warlita has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 13,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more fish to sell.

Warlita has been in this business for fifteen years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell.

loans.name: Almera

texts.en:
Almera is a married woman with one child. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Almera is 39 years old, and her child is in school.

Almera has a direct-selling Avon products business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 12,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more products, such as lotion, shampoo, deodorant, body spray, etc., to sell to her customers.

Almera has been in this business for five years. She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more products, such as lotion, shampoo, deodorant, body spray, etc., to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Carmel

texts.en:
Carmel works hard to support her family. She is married and has a tailoring business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for five years now.

Carmel requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional materials such as fabric, thread, zippers, etc. for her business.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Carmel would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional materials such as fabric, thread, zippers, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Amivi

texts.fr: Amivi, âgée de 40 ans est une femme mariée et vit à Adamavo avec son mari et ses deux enfants. Amivi vend des habits de prêt à porter en se promenant dans les marchés et dans les quartiers environnant pour fournir ses clients. Pour avoir un stock toujours disponible, Amivi s’approvisionne deux fois par semaine au marché. Amivi a le désir de commander de nouvelles tenues  pour équiper son étagère et nécessite ce fonds pour réaliser son achat afin d'avoir une rentabilité lui permettant de soutenir les charges de sa famille.
texts.en:
Amivi, age 40, is a married woman who lives in Adamavo with her husband and their two children. Amivi sells ready-to-wear apparel as an itinerant vendor going around the markets and nearby districts to supply her customers. 

To ensure that she remains well-stocked, Amivi buys her goods twice a week at the market. 

In order to stock up on new items, she is seeking this loan to help finance her purchase. Her goal is to sustain a profitability that will help to support her family.

loans.use: to buy 30 shirts, 64 skirts and 25 dresses.

loans.name: Akouwa

texts.fr: Akouwa est femme veuve qui est âgée de 35 ans et vit à Nyiveme avec ses trois enfants à Agoè. Akouwa vend de la boute de pate préparée à l’aide du maïs. Ce commerce lui procure une rentabilité nécessaire pour assurer la survie quotidienne de ses enfants et leur éducation. Akouwa achète une fois par mois ses  marchandises au marché de Lomé. Pour lancer un nouvel achat de sacs de maïs, Akouwa demande ce prêt pour la réalisation de son objectif
texts.en: Akouwa is a 35-year old widow who lives in the Nyiveme district of Agoè with her three children. She sells dough balls made with corn. This business generates sufficient profit to ensure her children's daily survival as well as their education. Akouwa buys her goods once a month at the market in Lomé. In order to be able to purchase  some new sacks of rice, she is asking for a loan.

loans.use: to buy 38 bowls of corn.

loans.name: Concepcion

texts.en:
Concepcion is 52 years old and married with four children. With three children still in school, Concepcion works very hard to provide for them.

Concepcion runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store.

Concepcion has been in this business for nine years and sells a variety of items such as noodles, biscuits, detergent soap, vinegar, shampoo, fabric conditioner, etc.

In the future, Concepcion would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Elisilda

texts.en:
Elisilda is 51 years old and married with three children. With one child still in school, Elisilda works very hard to provide for them. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more items like canned goods, dried fish, sugar, coffee, cereals, etc. to sell.

Elisilda has been in this business for four years and sells a variety of items. She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her general store business. Elisilda would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more items to sell like canned goods, dried fish, sugar, coffee, cereals, etc.

loans.name: Editha

texts.en:
Editha is 59 years old and married with four children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Editha has a general store business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 11,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more stock to sell in her general store.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Editha has been in this business for four years. She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda is 59 years old and married with two children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She has a food vending business in the Philippines. Erlinda has requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase ingredients like bananas, cooking oil, sugar, etc. for her business.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business. She has been in this business for 11 years. Erlinda would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients like bananas, cooking oil, sugar, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Irina

texts.en:
Irina is from Khoost. She is 55 and has two grown up sons and is a proud Grandma. She has a fabric sales business in her hometown. She started this business over 10 years ago. At the moment, Irina rents out her vending facility. She works herself and doesn’t have any hired employees. 

Irina is hoping to invest additional funds of 50,000 UAH in a variety of fabrics, accessories and trims to sell. She is planning to reinvest a larger portion of earned income in the further growth of her trade, as well as use some money to help her family and grandchildren. Irina wants to provide sufficient funds for elderly age when she will be retired. She knows how socially insecure retired people can be in Ukraine, which is why she is not willing to put her hopes in the government, but rather provide a decent retirement on her own.

loans.use: to buy a variety of fabrics, accessories and trims to sell.

loans.name: Roman

texts.en:
Roman is 34 and he is from Kamenka. Roman is married with two children. He has been working in farming for five years. He is used to farm work, which is why he decided to invest his energy and resources in this business sphere. He studied in college to be a welder, which is very helpful in running his own business, as well as helping other farmers’ businesses. So far he already has two big greenhouses and a separate one for seedlings. Roman mostly grows cucumbers and tomatoes. 

Roman is seeking additional funds of 10,000 UAH to buy fertilizers and plastic film for greenhouses for the upcoming spring season. In the near future, Roman is planning to construct a new greenhouse and install a heating system in all other greenhouses as well.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and plastic film for greenhouses for the upcoming spring season.

loans.name: Eva Julia

texts.es:
Eva es una mujer de 36 años, divorciada, tiene 4 hijos de 14, 11, 9 y 5 años, y su negocio es la pesca. 
Ella es buena madre, fuerte, independiente, constante, responsable y trabajadora. Su trabajo lo desarrolla en la comunidad Lupalaya, situado a orillas del Lago Titicaca (El lago más alto del mundo), de clima frío y seco con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre 6° C y 22° C., se encuentra a 83 Km. de la ciudad el viaje es de 1hora 45minutos, los pobladores viven de la pesca y de la agricultura. 
Eva es de tez morena, cabello negro largo lo usa amarrado, ojos obscuros, baja estatura, complexión física mediana. Su lengua materna es el Aymará que se habla en el lugar y habla español por cultura general y por el comercio que realiza. su vida la comparte con sus hijos que estudian en la escuela, viven en una casa propia, construida de adobe con techo de calamina que cuenta con agua de pozo y energía eléctrica. Su negocio es la pesca; su trabajo comienza a las 5 de la tarde; a esa hora, los botes llevan las redes que se colocan en distintos lugares del lago. A las 4 y media de la madrugada del día siguiente recogen las redes y las llevan a la orilla del lago donde aguardan los hijos y familiares para ayudar a desenredar los pescados, El frío es muy fuerte y se nota en las manos de los pescadores que siempre están rajadas. Todas las noches lleva 5 o 6 redes para anclarlas en el lago Sagrado y así lograr su alimento y el excedente lo destina al mercado para el comercio. “la venta comienza a las 6 de la mañana cuando llegan los distribuidores; luego de recoger nuestra pesca la trasladan hasta la ciudad, ahí están otras revendedoras que llevan el pescado a los diferentes mercados de las ciudades...” comenta. Su sueño es construir una casa de ladrillo, ella desea ampliar su negocio mediante la compra de pescado por mayor para distribuirlo al interior del país. Esta es la 2 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 14 años que viene desarrollando esta actividad de forma independiente.
Es por esos motivos que Eva solicita un préstamo para la compra de pescado por mayor para distribuirlo al interior del país y construir una casa.
texts.en:
Eva is a 36-year-old woman, she is divorced and she has 4 children, who are 14, 11, 9, and 5 years old, and her business is fishing. 
She is a good mother, strong, independent, constant, responsible, and hard-working. She does her work in the community of Lupalaya, located on the shores of Lake Titicaca (the highest lake in the world), of cold and dry climate, with a temperature that varies during the day between 6 and 22 degrees centigrade. It is located 83 km away from the city, and the journey takes 1 hour and 45 minutes. The residents work in fishing and agriculture. 
Eva is brown skinned, she has long black hair which she ties back, dark eyes, low height, and medium physical shape. Her mother tongue is Aymará, which is spoken in the area, and she speaks Spanish as general culture and because of her business. She shares her life with her children who attend school, they live in a house that they own, made of adobe with an iron roof. It has water from a well and electricity. Her business is fishing, she starts work at 5 in the afternoon; at this hour, the boats takes the nets with are located in different areas of the lake. At four thirty in the morning of the next day, they pick up the nets and taken them to the shores of the lake, where children and relatives are waiting to untangle the fish. The cold is very strong, and one can tell from the hands of the fishermen, which are always cracked. Every night, she brings 5 or 6 nets to anchor them in the holy lake and be able to get her food, and the excess she takes to the market for selling. “The sale starts at 6 in the morning, when the distributors arrive; after they pick up our fish, they take it to the city, and others resell and take the fish to different city markets…” she says. Her dream is to build a brick home, and she wants to expand her business through the purchase of fish at wholesale to distribute inland. In the 14 years that she has had this occupation in an independent way, this is the second sequence of loans with the institution.
It is for these reasons that Eva asks for a loan, for the purchase of fish at wholesale to distribute inland and build a house.

loans.use: for the purchase of fish at wholesale to distribute inland and to build a house.

loans.name: Esterlita

texts.en:
Esterlita is 53 years old and married with five children. She works very hard to provide for them. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional stock like canned goods, shampoo, candies, cereals, coffee, sugar, etc. to sell.

Esterlita has been in this business for five years and sells a variety of items.  In the future, Esterlita would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional stock to sell like canned goods, shampoo, candies, cereals, coffee, sugar, etc.

loans.name: Gemma

texts.en: Gemma is 50 years old and married with six children. For four years, Gemma has been in the business of fattening pigs in the Philippines. She has borrowed ten times from Kiva's partner, Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation (NWTF), to sustain her business. Gemma has requested a new loan of 14,000 PHP through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs. In the future, Gemma would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Gina

texts.en: Gina works hard to support her family. Gina is married and has a pillow making business in the Philippines, which she has been operating for 15 years. Gina has requested a 12,000 PHP loan through Kiva's partner, Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, to purchase more materials for her business. She successfully paid back her previous loan. Gina would like to expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more materials for her business

loans.name: Jeralyn

texts.en:
Jeralyn works hard to support her family. She is married and has a fruit vending business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 16,000 loan through NWTF to buy more boxes of fruits to sell to her customers.

Jeralyn has been in this business for 15 years now. She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business. Jeralyn would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more boxes of fruits to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Maria Martir

texts.es:
María, ha tenido un resultado positivo con el préstamo anterior, pues mantiene su negocio funcionando y cubriendo las necesidades de su familia, para María es muy gratificante el poder continuar apoyando a sus hijos para que se mantengan estudiando.
Se decidió por un nuevo crédito para comprar hilo de seda en muchos colores para elaborar hamacas, tendrá materia prima para mantener su fuente de ingresos.
texts.en:
María's last loan yielded positive results. Her business is still running and she is providing for her family's needs. María finds it very gratifying to be able to keep supporting her children so they can stay in school. 

She has decided to request a new loan to buy silk string in many different colors for making hammocks. This way she will have the supplies she needs in order to maintain her source of income.

loans.use: to buy silk string for making hammocks.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine works hard to support her family. She is married and has a food vending business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

Josephine has been in this business for eight years now. She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business.

loans.name: Leonida

texts.en:
Leonida works hard to support her family. She is widowed and has a business buying and selling coconut fruit in the Philippines.

Leonida requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more coconut fruit to sell. She has been in this business for five years now. Leonida would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more coconut fruit to sell.

loans.name: Massan

texts.fr: Massan est une femme veuve âgée de 49 ans et habite dans le quartier de Klévé à Agoè. Malgré son âge et sa sollicitude Massan travaille courageusement pour assurer les charges quotidiennes de ses deux enfants. Pour répondre à ce besoin, Massan vend des produits d’alimentation au marché pour avoir le revenu nécessaire. Massan désire ce crédit pour commander quelque sac  d’oignons qui vont permettre d’élargir son commerce et tirer assez de bénéfice.
texts.en:
Massan, age 49, is a widowed mother of two who lives in the district of Klévé in Agoè. Despite her age and concerns, Massan works with great courage to support her children’s day-to-day needs. To that end, she earns the necessary income by selling food products at the market. 

Massan is seeking this loan to order a few bags of onions. This will help to expand her activity and yield enough profits.

loans.use: to buy onions.

loans.name: Lotoifale

texts.en: Lotoifale is a 22-year-old woman who is married and has three children. She runs a business of sewing and selling clothes in her community. She has four years of experience with this business. Lotoifale has requested a loan to buy materials, needles, thread, a sewing machine, etc. She plans to use her profits to improve her business and to save for unexpected emergencies. She joined SPBD in 2012 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy materials, needles, thread, a sewing machine, etc.

loans.name: Delia

texts.en: Delia is a 27-year-old woman who is married and has three children. She runs a business of sewing and selling clothes in her community. She has four years of experience with this business. Delia has requested a loan to buy materials, needles, thread, a sewing machine, etc. She plans to use her profits to improve her business and to support her family financially. She joined SPBD in 2012 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy materials, needles, thread, a sewing machine, etc.

loans.name: Evgeniy

texts.en:
Evgeniy is married and has two children. He has his own business. Evgeniy has been growing vegetables in greenhouses for 11 years. He grows cucumbers and tomatoes. He has four regular greenhouses and one greenhouse for seedlings. He has problems with his eyes, but he is a hardworking person and does his job well. He wants to develop his business further. He plans to install a new heating system in his greenhouses.  

Evgeniy is asking for a loan of 15,000 UAH to fix one of his greenhouses. During the winter one greenhouse was destroyed by a snowstorm and needs to be fixed.

loans.use: to fix a greenhouse destroyed by a snowstorm.

loans.name: Vladimir

texts.en:
Vladimir is married and has two teenage sons. He lives in a house with his family in a small village. He has his own business. Vladimir has been growing vegetables in greenhouses for 20 years. He grows tomatoes, cucumbers and radishes. He has three big greenhouses and two greenhouses for seedlings. Vladimir is a very hardworking person. He is planning to build a new greenhouse in the future and install a heating system.

Vladimir is asking for a loan of 10,000 UAH to buy film to cover his three greenhouses.

loans.use: to buy film to cover his greenhouses.

loans.name: Alexander

texts.en:
Alexander is married and has two adult children. He owns a small business. Alexander has been growing vegetables in greenhouses for seven years. He has two big greenhouses and a greenhouse for seedlings. He grows cucumbers and tomatoes. He also has a part-time job as a welder. He is ambitious and a hardworking person. In the future, Alexander plans to improve the heating system in his greenhouses.

Alexander is asking for a loan 10,000 UAH to buy seeds, film and fertilizers for his greenhouses.

loans.use: to buy seeds, film and fertilizers for his greenhouses.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan Carlos tiene 37 años de edad, vive en casa familiar con sus padres en el distrito de Cayaltí que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. Vive en una comunidad dedicada al comercio, agricultura y ganadería.

El se dedica a brindar servicio de transporte de pasajeros en mototaxi en el distrito de Cayaltí y zonas cercanas, cuenta con 05 años de experiencia en este negocio y con clientes fijos quienes brindan muy buenas referencias personales y laborales de el. El préstamo será para realizar reparaciones y mantenimiento de su vehículo ya que actualmente se encuentra en mal estado, con esto Juan Carlos espera ofrecer un mejor servicio a sus clientes lo que le va a permitir obtener mayores ingresos que mejorarán su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Juan Carlos is 37 years old, he lives in a family house with his parents in the district of Cayaltí, which is located in the province of Chiclayo, in the region of Lambayeque, on the northern coast of Peru. He lives in a community which works in commerce, agriculture, and livestock. 
His occupation is to supply transportation services to passengers on a motortaxi in the district of Cayaltí and nearby areas. He has 5 years of experience in this business, and has loyal clients who bring him good personal and work references. The loan will be used to make repairs and give maintenance to his vehicle, which is currently in bad shape. In this way, Juan Carlos hopes to offer a better service to his clients, which will allow him to obtain a larger income, which will improve his quality of life and of his family.

loans.use: to make repairs and give maintenance to his vehicle, which is currently in bad shape.

loans.name: Lydia

texts.en:
Lydia is 43 years old and married with five children. She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 22,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional items to sell in her general store.

Lydia has borrowed and repaid nine loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 10 years and also earns an income from food vending. She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business. Lydia aspires to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Nelieza

texts.en:
Nelieza is 42 years old and married with two children. With one child currently in school, Nelieza works very hard to provide for the family.

Nelieza runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 12,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more stock to sell in her general store.

Nelieza has been in this business for 10 years and sells a variety of items such as soft drinks, rice, canned goods, noodles, bread, biscuits, etc. 

Nelieza would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell in her general store

loans.name: Perlita

texts.en:
Perlita works hard to support her family. Perlita is married and has a tailoring business in the Philippines.

Perlita requested an 11,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more materials for her tailoring business.

Perlita has been in this business for 30 years now.

In the future, Perlita would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more materials for her tailoring business

loans.name: Magdalena

texts.en:
Magdalena is 46 years old and married with four children. She earns a living by having a pig fattening business in the Philippines. She has been in pig fattening for eight years and also earns additional income from video gaming machine rental.

Magdalena is borrowing PHP 17,000 through NWTF to purchase feed and other supplies for her business. She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business. She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream, to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase feed and other supplies for her business.

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.en:
Marcelina is 49 years old and has three children, two of whom are currently in school. She is married.

Marcelina is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. She requested a 20,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy vaccines, feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Marcelina has been raising pigs for 10 years now, and has borrowed five times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Marcelina would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy vaccines, feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Rizalina

texts.en:
Rizalina is a married woman with six children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Rizalina is 42 years old, and three of her children are currently in school.

Rizalina has a direct selling of personal products business in the Philippines. Rizalina requested a 16,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF to buy additional items like detergent soap, body spray, fabric conditioner, lotion, etc., to sell.

Rizalina has been in this business for three years. In the future, Rizalina would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional items from personal collection like detergent soap, body spray, fabric conditioner, lotion, etc. to sell

loans.name: Rosemarie

texts.en:
Rosemarie works hard to support her family. Rosemarie is married and has a general store business in the Philippines.

Rosemarie requested a PHP 16,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional groceries to sell in her general store.

Rosemarie has been in this business for five years now.

Rosemarie would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Rowena

texts.en:
Rowena works hard to support her family. Rowena is married and has a manicure/pedicure service business in the Philippines.

Rowena requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional materials like nail polish and nippers for her business.

Rowena has been in this business for five years now.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting this new loan to further build her business.

Rowena would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use:
to purchase additional materials like nail polish and nippers
for her business

loans.name: Magna

texts.es: Magna tiene 33 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a sus dos hijos de 12 años y 10 años de edad. Magna es una mujer luchadora quien se dedica a la prestación de servicios  domésticos desde hace mucho tiempo y es así como junto a su compañero de vida mantienen la economía del hogar. Magna ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI dado que desea mejorar las condiciones del techo de su vivienda. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de  lámina galvanizada y madera para reparar el techo de la vivienda.
texts.en:
Magna is 33 years old and resides in her own home along with her two children, ages 12 and 10. She is a determined woman who has been offering housekeeping services from quite some time. Magna and her life companion work together to maintain the household finances.

She decided to request this loan from FUSAI because she wants to improve the condition of the roof of her home. Therefore, she is asking that this money be invested in the purchase of galvanized sheets and wood for repairs to the roof of her home.

loans.use: to buy galvanized sheets and wood in order to repair the roof of her home.

loans.name: Marissa

texts.en:
Marissa is a married woman with seven children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Marissa is 47 years old and has two children who are currently in school. She has a business selling firewood in the Philippines. She has been in this business for four years.

Marissa has requested a PHP 11,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy additional stock of firewood to sell to her customers. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional stock of firewood to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Marivic

texts.en:
Marivic is a married woman with one child who is in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She is 40 years old and has a food vending business in the Philippines.  She has been in this business for 13 years.

Marivic has requested a PHP 12,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients like cooking oil, frozen foods, etc. for her food production business. She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business. She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like cooking oil, frozen foods, etc. for her food production business.

loans.name: Robelyn

texts.en:
Robelyn is 34 years old and a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Robelyn has a general store business in the Philippines. Robelyn requested a 15,500 PHP loan amount through NWTF to purchase additional items like detergent soap, shampoo, eggs, biscuits, cereals, coffee, noodles, etc., to sell.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Robelyn has been in this business for four years. In the future, Robelyn would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional items like detergent soap, shampoo, eggs, biscuits, cereals, coffee, noodles, etc., to sell

loans.name: Teofila

texts.en:
Teofila is 60 years old, married and has nine children, one still in school.

Teofila is in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines. Teofila requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Teofila has been in pig fattening for three years now, and has borrowed six times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

Teofila would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Victoria

texts.en:
Victoria is 56 years old and married with two children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. 

Victoria has a business selling herbal products in the Philippines. Victoria requested a PHP 17,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more herbal products to sell to her customers.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting this new loan to further build her business.

Victoria has been in this business for seven years. Victoria would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more herbal products to sell to her customers

loans.name: Rosalie

texts.en:
Rosalie is a married woman with two children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Rosalie is 39 years old, and both children are in school.

Rosalie has a fish-vending business in the Philippines. Rosalie requested a 12,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF to buy more fish to sell.

Rosalie has been in this business for eight years. In the future, Rosalie would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell

loans.name: Virgie

texts.en:
Virgie is a 39-year-old married woman with six children, four in school. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. 

Virgie has a firewood business in the Philippines. Virgie requested a PHP  10,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional firewood to sell.

Virgie has been in this business for four years. In the future, Virgie would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional firewood to sell

loans.name: Wencelma

texts.en:
Wencelma is 54 years old and a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Wencelma has a food and refreshment vending business in the Philippines. Wencelma requested a PHP 29,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients for her business.

Wencelma has been in this business for five years. In the future, Wencelma would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her business

loans.name: Diolita

texts.en:
Diolita is a married woman with five children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Diolita is 46 years old, and three of her children are currently in school.

Diolita has a motorcycle transport business in the Philippines. Diolita requested a PHP 25,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy spare parts for the maintenance of her motorcycle.

Diolita has been in this business for six years. In the future, Diolita would like to save enough money to afford sending her children to college.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for the maintenance of her motorcycle

loans.name: Lilian Francisca

texts.es:
Lilian, vende prendas de vestir como camisas, faldas, blusas, pantalones, ropa interior, etc., lo realiza de manera ambulante y en su vivienda, está actividad la emprendió por la necesidad de cubrir gastos familiares, no existe un horario establecido, es casada, vive con su compañero de vida y dos hijos, los cuales están estudiando.
El capital le ayudara a comprar pantalones, faldas, camisas, chores, etc., tendrán mercadería a mejor precio y con nuevos modelos, de esa forma espera que las ventas sean mayores, lograr atraer nuevos clientes y que las ganancias sean mayores.
Sus objetivos a cumplir son ser un apoyo para que sus hijos estudien y tener el negocio mejor surtido.
texts.en:
Lilian sells clothing such as shirts, blouses, skirts, pants, underwear, etc.  She does this as a walking saleswoman and also out of her home.  She began this work in order to cover household expenses.  She does not have a fixed schedule.  She is married and lives with her life partner and two children who are in school. 

The loan will help her to purchase pants, skirts, shirts, shorts, etc.  She will thus be able to sell merchandise at a better price and with the latest fashions, and in this way she hopes to increase her sales, gain new customers and augment her income.  

Her goals are to have a better supplied business and to support her children so that they can continue in school.

loans.use: to purchase pants, skirts, shirts, shorts, etc. so that she can supply her business with newer styles and offer better prices.

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es:
La señora Mercedes siempre se ha caracterizado por ser una mujer responsable, amorosa, honesta y honrada, ella  siempre le toco luchar sola en la vida, sus dos hijos han significado su aliciente para salir adelante y aunque tiene una profesión modesta tiene mucho que agradecerle pues le dio de comer cuando tenía hambre.

Mercedes se dedica a la venta de arepas asadas en carbón, la arepa es un producto hecho de maíz muy tradicional en Antioquía, su consumo es diario más que todo en el desayuno.

Su idea con el negocio es poder mejorar las ventas, aumentar sus clientes y porque no tener un negocio, pero en ocasiones se ve muy imposibilitada por la fuerte competencia que hay en el sector donde fabrican arepas en masa, con maquinaria, por el contrario la que ella ofrecen son hechas artesanalmente y en carbón, por lo que los costos son mayores.

Mercedes quiere recurrir a tu ayuda y es que se encuentra solicitando un préstamo el cual invertirá en la compra de carbón y maíz en cantidades, para poder seguir farbicando sus arepas y generar los recursos para su familia.
texts.en:
Mercedes has always been known as a responsible, loving, honest, and honorable woman.  She has always had to struggle alone in life.  Her two sons have been her motivation to get ahead and although she has a modest profession she is very grateful because it gave them enough to eat when they were hungry. 

Mercedes works selling grilled arepas cooked over coal. Arepas are a traditional flatcake made of corn and they very well-known in her region.  People eat them every day, particularly for breakfast.  

Her goal with the business is to increase sales and to add to her customers, and she sees no reason not to run the business, but at times it seems impossible because there is a lot of competition in her area from others who make arepas in bulk by machine.  In contrast, she makes hers by hand and over an open fire, which makes them more expensive.  

Mercedes is asking for your help and is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of coal and corn in bulk in order to continue making arepas and generating income for her family.

loans.use: to purchase products for making arepas such as corn and coal.

loans.name: Jairo Ernesto

texts.es:
Jairo, de 24 años de edad, está acompañado y tiene un niño de 2 años de edad y su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos.

Jairo, tiene 6 años de estar laborando en una gasolinera de su pueblo, con su trabajo ha logrado ayudar a pagar los gastos de su familia. 

Jairo, con el crédito comprara materiales para reparar su casa, ya que se acerca el invierno y necesita repararlas para no mojarse y evitar que su familia sufra o se enfermen.

Jairo, sueña con continuar sus estudios en la universidad y graduarse de una carrera.
texts.en:
Jairo is 24 years old, in a relationship, and has a two-year-old son. His partner takes care of the household chores. For the past six years, Jairo has worked at a gas station in his town. With his job, he is able to help pay for his family’s expenses.

Jairo will use this loan to buy materials for repairing his house. With winter approaching, he needs to repair it so that moisture does not seep through, which would make his family uncomfortable and susceptible to illness.

Jairo dreams of continuing his studies at the university so that he can graduate with a degree.

loans.use: to buy materials for repairing his house.

loans.name: Dora Maria

texts.es:
Dora, de 45 años de edad, estudio hasta noveno grado, es madre soltera de 2 hijos que aún viven en su casa, pero no dependen directamente de ella porque ya son mayores de edad. 

Dora, se dedica a la sastrería desde hace muchos años, este trabajo le genera buenos ingresos.

El préstamo lo utilizará para comprar tela, hilo y comprar equipo nuevo. 

Ella planea ampliar más su negocio, para que su familia tenga más y mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Dora is 45 years old and studied through ninth grade.  She is a single mother with two children who still live at home, but they do not depend directly on her because they are adults. 

Dora works as a seamstress and has been in this field for many years.  This work gives her a good income.

She will use her loan in order to purchase fabric, thread and a new sewing machine.  She plans to grow her business so that her family will have more and better income.

loans.use: to purchase fabric, thread, and a new sewing machine.

loans.name: Alberto

texts.es: ALBERTO: Es un señor jovial de 60 años de edad, casado con 3 hijos mayores de edad e independiente. Desde  hace 30 años habitan en una casa de madera y de tambo, que actualmente necesita reparación.  Es por eso que solicitan un préstamo para cambiar madera rústica, madera cepillada, postes de madera, clavos y cubrir costos de mano de obra. Ella y su marido sueñan con tener una casa de concreto que tenga mejores condiciones para sus hijos y sobre todo mayor seguridad.
texts.en: Alberto is a jovial 60 year old man.  He is married with three grown children.  For the past 30 years he has lived in a house made of wood, and now it needs to be repaired.  For this reason he is requesting a loan in order to update his home by replacing the old wood, the brushed wood, wooden posts, nails, and by covering the cost of manual labor.  Alberto and his wife dream of having a house made of concrete that will offer better living conditions for their children and above all better security.

loans.use: To replace the wood in his home.

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda is 39 years old and married with four children. Erlinda works very hard to provide for them.

Erlinda runs a general store in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 21,000 loan through NWTF to buy more stock like detergent soap, juice, cereals, noodles, cooking oil, and vinegar to sell.

Erlinda has been in this business for 12 years and sells a variety of items such as detergent soap, juice, cereals, noodles, cooking oil, vinegar and other goods. 

Erlinda would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more stock like detergent soap, juice, cereals, noodles, cooking oil, and vinegar to sell

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda works hard to support her family. Erlinda is married and has a business buying and selling cassava in the Philippines.

Erlinda requested a PHP 26,000 loan through NWTF to buy more cassava to sell to her customers.

Erlinda has been in this business for 14 years.

In the future, Erlinda would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more cassava to sell to her customers

loans.name: Reina

texts.en:
Reina works hard to support her family. Reina is married and has a general store business in the Philippines.

Reina requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more items like shampoo, sanitary pads, soft-drinks, and snack foods to sell in her store.

Reina has been in this business for 20 years.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Reina would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more items to sell like shampoo, sanitary pads, soft-drinks, and snack foods

loans.name: Jelyn

texts.en:
Jelyn is 28 years old and married with two children, who are both in school.

She earns a living by raising livestock in the Philippines. Jelyn is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF in order to buy feed and vitamins for her livestock.

Jelyn has been raising livestock for three years and earns additional income from a general store.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money to continue sending her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her livestock

loans.name: William

texts.es: William  tiene la edad de 21 años, está soltero  y vive con los padres actualmente. El crédito lo quiere para la compra de almacigo y abono y dar asistencia a una plantación de café que quieren iniciar. El desea darle el adecuado mantenimiento al cultivo para que este le permita tener una mayor producción y así tener mayores ingresos económicos. El espera en un futuro brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y una mayor estabilidad económica, y de poder seguir creciendo como persona y como productor. Es el primer préstamo que recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
William is 21 years old, single, and currently lives with his parents. He will use the loan to buy seedlings and compost so that he can maintain the coffee farm he plans to start. William wants to adequately maintain his crop so that he can achieve good production and generate a good income. In the future, he hopes to provide his family with a better quality of life and greater financial stability. He also wants to continue growing as a person and a producer.

This is the first loan William has received from FUDECOSUR. He has not had any other loans with the state banks. FUDECOSUR is offering this loan with better terms and a lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy seedlings and compost for his coffee farm.

loans.name: Maria Ercilia

texts.es:
María, de 39 años de edad, está acompañada y tiene una hija, su esposo le ayuda en su negocio.

María, se dedica a vender comida, tiene un comedor en su casa y también su esposo lleva comida a domicilio.- Ella trabajó en un comedor durante cinco años y fue ahí donde aprendió todo con respecto a este negocio, pero desde hace 10 años tiene su propio comedor, su hija le ayuda, el negocio está abierto desde las 6:00 de la mañana hasta las 3:00 de la tarde.

María, necesita el crédito para comprar un mostrador y establecer un local, de esa manera incrementará sus ingresos y mejorará su calidad de vida.

Ella, sueña con tener un comedor en su casa, para darle empleo a más personas que lo necesitan, también, desea que su hija se gradué de una carrera universitaria y que sea profesional.
texts.en:
María is 39 years old and lives with her partner and her daughter.  Her husband helps her with her business. 

Maria works selling food. She has a restaurant in her home and her husband also takes food to people's houses when they call in an order.  She worked in a restaurant for five years and it was there that she learned everything related to the business.  For the past 10 years she has run her own restaurant. Her daughter helps her.  The business is open from 6am until 3pm.

María needs a loan in order to purchase a counter and open up an official location. In this way she will increase her sales and improve her quality of life.  She dreams of having a successful restaurant in order to give jobs to other people who need them.  She also wants her daughter to graduate with a University degree and become a professional.

loans.use: To purchase a counter and establish an official restaurant.

loans.name: Jose Felix

texts.es: JOSE FELIX: Es un señor luchador de 53 años de edad, viudo con 5 hijos mayores de edad. Trabaja como guarda de seguridad, desde hace 25 años habita en una vivienda de minifalda de concreto y madera. Debido a que con su bajo salario no le ajusta para cambiar la madera de su vivienda, solicita su primer financiamiento para comprar madera cepillada, clavos y cubrir costos de mano de obra. El sueña con tener una vivienda digna, que le brinde las condiciones y comodidades a sus hijos.
texts.en: José Felix is a 53 year old man.  He is a widow with five grown children.  He works as a security guard.  For the past 25 years he has been living in a home made of a short skirt of concrete and wood.  Since his salary is too low to change the wood in his home, he is asking for his first loan to purchase brushed wood, nails and to pay for manual labor.  His dream is to have a dignified home that will offer better conditions and comfort to his children.

loans.use: to purchase brushed wood, nails and to pay for manual labor in order to replace the wood on his home.

loans.name: Marta

texts.es:
Marta, de 52 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, es madre soltera de 4 hijos mayores de edad, una de sus hijas vive con ella, las otras 3 están casadas y una le ayuda en el negocio con su esposo.

Marta, se dedica a la venta de pan y café en el mercado desde hace 16 años, además en fechas festivas o ferias, se dedica al comercio de ropa y sandalias en los pueblos; ella viaja para su negocio en transporte colectivo, la venta la hace de lunes a sábado.

Marta, necesita el dinero para comprar ropa y sandalias porque ya se aproxima la semana santa y quiere aprovechar la temporada, además comprará dos termos para mantener caliente el café, una hielera grande para tener la preparación de los panes, porque la que tiene es muy pequeña. 

Ella sueña con tener establecido su negocio, ya que actualmente hace ventas ambulantes, ella quiere tener su propio local, para preparar todo lo del negocio, guardar todo y no tener que andar cargando las hileras y los termos.
texts.en:
Marta is 52 years old and never had the opportunity to go to school.  She is a single mother with four grown children.  One of her kids lives with her, and the other three are married and one helps her with her business. 

Marta works selling bread and coffee in the market and has been in this field since she was 16.  In addition, during fairs or holidays, she works selling clothing and sandals in the surrounding towns.  She travels for her business via public collective buses, and she works from Monday through Saturday. 

Marta needs money in order to purchase clothing and sandals because Holy Week is coming and she wants to take advantage of the season.  Also she will buy two thermoses in order to keep the coffee that she sells hot.  She will also buy a large cooler for her breads, since the one she has is very small. 

She dreams of having her own business locale, since currently she is a walking saleswoman.  She wants to have her own place in order to make everything for her business, store everything there, and not have to carry around coolers and thermoses.

loans.use: to purchase clothing and sandals because Holy Week is coming and she wants to take advantage of the season.  Also she will buy two thermoses in order to keep the coffee that she sells hot.  She will also buy a large cooler for her breads, since the one she has is very small.

loans.name: Martha
